name: Enemy Fusion
description:
This project is for GMTK 2021 Jam, theme "Joined Together".

Downloadable version is the most stable version!

Gameplay: 

Top down 2D shooter 

Premise: 

You are struggling while fighting aliens with your small spaceship. You are able to fuse with enemy ships by dashing/boosting into them. Be careful though since if you dash at an enemy and miss, you'll lose one level of power up! So keep blasting, dodging and ramming enemies to stay alive for as long as you can! Also if you don't destroy any enemies within 5 seconds you lose a health point!

Goal:

-Live as long as possible!

-Dash into enemies to power yourself up!

-Blast some aliens in the face!

Controls:

Move: AWSD or Arrow Keys

Aim: Mouse position

Shoot: Left Mouse Click (LMB)

Dash: Right Mouse Click (RMB)

Credits:

Programmer/Art: Seth Funk - https://www.youtube.com/c/SethFunk

Music: Edie Evans -Music/SFX - https://soundcloud.com/edieevanss
